title: I HAVE an evition case for trail. If i file bankruptcy will the case continue to trial after the stay is lifted
question: will the eviction case continue to trial after a bankruptcy stay is lifted
answers: Landlords having their eviction case already set for trial have an expedited relief from stay process when the tenant files BK. Best advice: start looking for a new place ASAP. Don't count on the BK giving you a large time cushion.
Most likely, YES. I suggest you consult with a bankruptcy lawyer and a landlord tenant lawyer ASAP.
